description: After installing the latest LCU on Windows 10 22H2 Enterprise, users encounter an unexpected behavior in the Control Panel where the Microsoft-Windows-TS-OptionalComponents-Package is shown as removed. Upon attempting to uninstall via Control Panel, the system executes 'mstsc.exe /uninstall', indicating a linkage issue with the Remote Desktop Services components. This change appears undocumented and may impact system functionalities relying on these optional components, causing confusion among administrators seeking a resolution.
